page.title: 15 Attitudes Con't
page.content:
For such a small village it was quite remarkable that different people sent/send their child/children to so many different schools. The schools involved are named as so :
{ a) Cheadle Hulme Primary, { b) Congleton Grammer School, { c) Lower Whithington Junior School, { d) Kings School Macclesfield, { e) The Ryles, { f) Harrow, { g) Eaton, { h) Repton, and { i) Terra Nova.
The schools are a wide range of junior, senior, comprehensive and grammer schools, but there is a strong emphasis on the preparatory and public schools.
